title: Straw Cup - Dr. Brown's Baby's First Straw Cup
description:
Designed to help baby transition from bottle to cup, this spill-proof straw cup features a soft, flexible straw that allows your baby to drink while holding this cup at any angle. Helping your little one learn to use a straw and designed with handles that are easy for little hands to hold, the cup also features these benefits:

• Spill-proof and travel safe with handles that are easy for little hands to hold
• Attached lid stays open when baby drinks and keeps straw clean when not in use
• Easy to use, easy to clean and dishwasher safe
• Straw cleaning brush included
• Available in 9 oz/270 ml size
• BPA free

Expanded Description
Designed to help baby transition from bottle to cup, this spill-proof straw cup features a soft, flexible straw that allows your baby to drink while holding this cup at any angle. Helping your little one learn to use a straw and designed with handles that are easy for little hands to hold, the cup features an attached lid that stays open when baby drinks and keeps straw clean when not in use. Perfect for travel, Baby’s First Straw Cup is easy to use, easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Also includes a straw cleaning brush. Available in 9 oz/270 ml size. BPA free. 
 
Helps Baby Transition From Bottle To Cup
Cup handles are easy to grip and feel like a bottle to little hands whiles helping your baby transition from bottle to cup. 

Spill Proof And Travel Safe
Perfect for travel, this spill-proof cup features a soft, flexible straw that allows your baby to drink while in a reclined position. 

Convenient Attached Lid
The cup features an attached lid that stays open when baby drinks and keeps straw clean when not in use.

Easy To Clean
For cleaning convenience, this cup is dishwasher safe and a straw cleaning brush is also included. 

Dr. Brown’s Baby’s First Straw Cup is part of a complete family of products that grows with your baby, including bottle accessories, breastfeeding products, pacifiers, teethers, cups, solid feeding, and baby care.
